snippet.title: Deadfall Adventures Heart of Atlantis PS3 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Deadfall Adventures: Heart of Atlantis is an action-packed first-person shooter, enlivened with adventure elements. The game casts the player as James Lee Quatermain, a hothead explorer with a nose for trouble. As Quatermain, the player is charged with exploring and hunting for treasures, while also exploring unknown regions of the world to rescue the damsels in distress from the clutches of earthly and inhuman enemies. 

More:
https://www.facebook.com/deadfalladventures
https://twitter.com/DeadfallAdv
